name: Balsamic Chicken
author: SHERRYLYNN2
summary: A tasty, easy-to-make chicken dish -- my husband loves it. Sometimes I cut the chicken in strips,and serve over pasta.
directions: Whisk together the balsamic vinegar, chicken broth, sugar, garlic, and Italian seasoning in a bowl, place the chicken breasts in the marinade, and marinate for 10 minutes on each side
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Remove the chicken from the marinade and reserve the marinade
Place the chicken in the heated pan and cook until they start to brown and are no longer pink inside, about 7 minutes per side
Pour the marinade into the skillet, and cook until it thickens slightly, turning the chicken breasts over once or twice, about 5 minutes
